折线图:
Parameter Description:

```message
1. Data Source: Data source of the chart.
2. X-axis Configuration: Decide what information is labeled on the X-axis.
3. Y-axis Configuration: Explain what values are displayed on the Y-axis.
4. Style Requirements: Specify the design scheme of the chart, such as color scheme, background, etc.
```Sample:

```message
1. Data Source: Generate a line chart from the histogramTable in templateData.
2. X-axis Configuration: Titles of the table.
3. Y-axis Configuration: Field values.
4. Style Requirements:
 - Color Scheme: Line colors are based on table record categories, displaying different colors.
 - Display values on the line.
```
柱状图:
Parameter Description:

```message
1. Data Source: Data source of the chart.
2. Data Layout:
 ○Non-stacked: Each bar represents a single value for the category.
 ○Stacked: Each bar represents multiple values for the same category.
3. X-axis Configuration: Decide what information is labeled on the X-axis.
4. Y-axis Configuration: Explain what values are displayed on the Y-axis.
5. Style Requirements: Specify the design scheme of the chart, such as color scheme, background, etc.
```Sample:

```message
1. Data Source: Generate a bar chart from the histogramTable in templateData.
2. Data Layout: Non-stacked.
3. X-axis Configuration: The X-axis displays the column titles of the histogramTable as category labels.
4. Y-axis Configuration: The Y-axis represents the data values of each column in the histogramTable.
5. Style Requirements:
 - Color Scheme: The color of the bars is automatically generated according to the data categories, using a gradient from light blue to dark blue.
 - Font: Arial font, 12pt size, color is dark gray (#444444).
 - Background and Grid Lines: Background is ivory (#F8F8F8), the grid lines of the Y-axis and X-axis are set to fine dashed lines, color is light gray (#DDDDDD).
```
饼图:
Parameter Description:

```message
1. Data Source: Data source of the chart.
2. X-axis Configuration: Decide what information is labeled on the X-axis.
3. Y-axis Configuration: Explain what values are displayed on the Y-axis.
4. Style Requirements: Specify the design scheme of the chart, such as color scheme, background, etc.
```Sample:

```message
1. Data Source: Generate a pie chart from the pieChartTable in templateData.
2. X-axis Configuration: Titles of the table.
3. Y-axis Configuration: Field values.
4. Style Requirements:
 - Color Scheme: Pie chart colors are based on table column titles, displaying different colors.
 - Smooth edges, enlarge on highlight.
```
雷达图:
Parameter Description:

```message
1. Data Source: Data source of the chart.
2. Table Fields: Field information of the data source, formatted as field name (title).
3. Style Requirements: Specify the design scheme of the chart, such as color scheme, background, etc.
```Sample:

```message
1. Data Source: Generate a radar chart from the radarChartTable in templateData.
2. Table Fields: mon(Mon), tue(Tue), wed(Wed).
3. Style Requirements:
 - Font: Arial font, 12pt size, color is black.
```
散点图:
Parameter Description:

```message
1. Data Source: Data source of the chart.
2. Style Requirements: Specify the design scheme of the chart, such as color scheme, background, etc.
```Sample:

```message
1. Data Source: Generate a scatter plot from the scatterPlotTable in templateData.
2. Style Requirements: Display values on the scatter points.
```
漏斗图:
Parameter Description:

```message
1. Data Source: Data source of the chart.
2. Table Fields: Field information of the data source, formatted as field name (title).
3. Style Requirements: Specify the design scheme of the chart, such as color scheme, background, etc.
```Sample:

```message
1. Data Source: Generate a funnel chart from the funnelChartTable in templateData.
2. Table Fields: mon(Mon), tue(Tue), wed(Wed), thu(Thu), fri(Fri), sat(Sat), sun(Sun).
3. Style Requirements:
 - Color Scheme: Funnel chart colors are based on table record categories, displaying different colors.
```
html:
Parameter Description:

```message
1. Data Source: Data source read from html.
2. Data Format: Data type of the data source fields.
3. Requirements: Specify the design scheme of html, such as element setting scheme, color scheme, etc.
```Sample:

```message
1. Data Source: Display richText and richImage from templateData in html components.
2. Data Format:
 - richText data format: Text
 - richImage data format: Image URL
3. Requirements:
 - Set the 'プライバシーポリシー' text in richText as a link, and click to jump to 'https://www.opentext.com/ja-jp/about/privacy'
```
